subject: fix: comprehensive code review — 24 security, perf, a11y, and quality fixes
body:
Security: XSS fix in debug banner (innerHTML→DOM API), temp file path
moved to os.tmpdir(), event delegation replaces per-render listeners.

Performance: Batched git stat extraction (1 cmd vs 2n), concurrent API
fetching (5-worker pool), getComputedStyle moved out of render path.

Data integrity: Atomic pending batch deletion, fixed filesChanged calc,
added repo_id to API security events, added metadata fields.

Accessibility: aria-labels on stat/contributor cards and drop zone,
aria-controls on CollapsibleSection, consistent empty state messages.

Code quality: Silent catches→console.warn, stale closure fix, inline
styles→CSS classes, Easter dates 2020-2030, removed unused sharp dep.

CSS/Config: Defined --shadow-lg and --color-primary-alpha, removed
collapsible max-height cap, added woff2 to PWA precache.
